definitions.definition: Able to be plowed or tilled , capable of growing crops ( traditionally contrasted with pasturable lands such as heaths ).
Under cultivation (within any quinquennial period ) for the production of crops sown and harvested within the same agricultural year ( contrasted with permanently- cropped lands such as orchards ).

main_definition: ( agriculture , of land ) Able to be plowed or tilled , capable of growing crops ( traditionally contrasted with pasturable lands such as heaths ).
secondary_definitions: ( agriculture , NGO jargon , of land ) Under cultivation (within any quinquennial period ) for the production of crops sown and harvested within the same agricultural year ( contrasted with permanently- cropped lands such as orchards ).
